Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA/transport dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

Messaging.Pattern: Transactional outbox for outbound events; idempotent consumers.

External.Service: External IdP (Keycloak/Auth0) for authentication; account-service consumes tokens and stores profile metadata

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; BUYER/INSTALLER/ADMIN roles; SERVICE for internal lookups.
Security.Validation: Bean Validation on DTOs; domain invariants for email/addresses/roles.
Security.PII: PII minimization; encryption at rest configured at DB level; audit for reads/writes if required.

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; metrics: profile update latency, lookup latency, audit events.
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (ACC-PROFILE-*, ACC-ADDR-*, ACC-ROLE-*) for belief-state tracing.

Resilience.Retries: Idempotent writes only; circuit breakers for IdP and DB where relevant.

Testing.Contract: OpenAPI for REST; AsyncAPI/Avro for account.updated
Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
